Package main.FaaS

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
main.FaaS.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Controller extends Object implements Observer
The Controller class manages the invocation of actions in a Function-as-a-Service (FaaS) environment. It implements the Observer interface to receive metrics updates.

    • registerAction

      public <T, R> void registerAction(String actionName, Function<T,R> function, int memorySize)
      Registers a new action with the given name, function, and memory size.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the input to the function
      R - the type of the result of the function
      Parameters:
      actionName - the name of the action
      function - the function to be executed
      memorySize - the memory size allocated for the action

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the argument
      R - the type of the result
      Parameters:
      actionName - the name of the action
      args - the argument for the action
      Returns:
      the result of invoking the action

    • invoke

      public <T, R> List<R> invoke(String actionName, List<T> listOfParams)
      Invokes the action with the given name and list of parameters.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the parameters
      R - the type of the results
      Parameters:
      actionName - the name of the action
      listOfParams - the list of parameters for the action
      Returns:
      a list of results of invoking the action with each parameter

    • invoke_async

      public <T, R> Future<R> invoke_async(String actionName, T args)

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the argument
      R - the type of the result
      Parameters:
      actionName - the name of the action
      args - the argument for the action
      Returns:
      a Future representing the result of the asynchronous invocation
